:::{#about}

Paul joined the Machine Learning in Medical Image Analysis group as a PhD student to work on uncertainty quantification in medical prediction systems. 
Prior to that, he worked on probabilistic machine learning models for behavior quantification for animals at the [Mackelab](https://www.mackelab.org/). 

Starting in November 2025, Paul is working as a post-doc at the Department of Biomedical Engineering at the University of Basel, and preparing for his PhD defence.
